    | name      = Unknown Speaker

{{TranscriptBlock

    | text      = took a trip to another state.
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:11:34.960
    | text      = So the opportunities for him to be exposed to something
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:11:37.200
    | text      = seem pretty decent, at least.
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:11:38.840
    | text      = Yeah.
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:11:39.559
    | text      = His behavior as a whole would also fit with the COVID idea,
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:11:42.399
    | text      = because if he had COVID, he would still show up
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:11:45.000
    | text      = to his studio to do the show.
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:11:46.399
    | text      = Yeah, I texted him.
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:11:47.639
    | text      = He doesn't give a shit about his staff, and he's admitted
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:11:49.879
    | text      = he already did that the last time he had COVID.
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:11:52.360
    | text      = He went to the work and exposed everyone to it.
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:11:54.559
    | text      = Yeah, I heard that on Twitter.
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:11:56.159
    | text      = The first thing I texted you is like, well, of course
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:11:58.399
    | text      = he's still in the studio if he has COVID.
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:12:00.480
    | text      = And it would make sense why he wouldn't go to court
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:12:02.759
    | text      = or wouldn't want to go to court, because they
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:12:04.519
    | text      = take things seriously.
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:12:05.799
    | text      = Yeah, yeah, yeah.
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:12:06.600
    | text      = They would not like that.
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:12:07.519
    | text      = Yeah.
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:12:08.159
    | text      = So one of the primary reasons I didn't
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:12:09.639
    | text      = want to jump a gun on this is that I
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:12:11.320
    | text      = wanted to be able to have some kind of information
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:12:13.399
    | text      = and not just come to this show with assumptions and what ifs.
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:12:17.120
    | text      = Thankfully, on Wednesday, a sworn affidavit was filed,
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:12:19.799
    | text      = and we learned a little bit more about this medical emergency.
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:12:23.279
    | text      = As it turns out, on Monday, Alex had
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:12:25.279
    | text      = the complete lunatic and guy who fantasizes
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:12:27.519
    | text      = about murders, Dr. Marbles, on his show
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:12:30.000
    | text      = to do some fun COVID denialism content.
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:12:32.200
    | text      = Good stuff.
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:12:32.960
    | text      = When Marbles showed up at the studio to do the interview,
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:12:35.799
    | text      = his, quote, personal observations of Mr. Jones
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:12:38.360
    | text      = so alarmed him that he insisted on conducting
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:12:40.879
    | text      = a physical examination of Mr. Jones.
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:12:43.360
    | text      = He immediately advised Mr. Jones to go to an emergency room
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:12:46.159
    | text      = or call 911.
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:12:47.840
    | text      = After Mr. Jones refused, the physician
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:12:49.759
    | text      = advised him to stay home, which Mr. Jones did not do.
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:12:54.320
    | text      = Ah, OK.
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:12:55.799
    | text      = So if I understand this correctly,
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:12:57.919
    | text      = Dr. Marbles walked into Info Wars and said,
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:13:00.360
    | text      = you look like shit.
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:13:01.679
    | text      = You got to go to the doctor right now.
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:13:03.440
    | text      = Called 911.
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:13:04.279
    | text      = And Alex, appropriately understanding
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:13:06.679
    | text      = that Dr. Marbles is a moron, went, no, screw you.
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:13:10.360
    | text      = I would assume.
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:13:11.279
    | text      = But right off the bat, we have a few problems.
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:13:13.600
    | text      = The first is that Dr. Marbles is certifiably insane,
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:13:16.519
    | text      = and I wouldn't take directions to the grocery store from him,
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:13:18.940
    | text      = let alone medical advice.
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:13:20.600
    | text      = So this is all coming from him seeing Alex, getting
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:13:22.899
    | text      = freaked out, and then, I guess, checking his pulse.
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:13:25.840
    | text      = Whatever it was that Marbles saw was enough to advise
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:13:29.519
    | text      = Alex to call 911.
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:13:30.799
    | text      = So that does seem serious.
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:13:32.080
    | text      = Although, again, it's advice coming from a lunatic.
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:13:35.679
    | text      = Alex didn't take this advice, although he did pass it
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:13:38.240
    | text      = along to Norm Paddis to use as an excuse
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:13:40.759
    | text      = to not go to his scheduled deposition, which, again,
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:13:43.519
    | text      = probably would have come off a little more convincing
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:13:46.519
    | text      = if Alex hadn't done his show the next day.
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:13:49.419
    | text      = That really punctures any illusion
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:13:50.919
    | text      = that whatever he's dealing with would preclude him
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:13:52.720
    | text      = from sitting for a deposition.
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:13:53.960
    | text      = Oh my god, that's great.
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:13:55.639
    | text      = So having snubbed Dr. Marbles' advice and not called 911,
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:14:00.159
    | text      = Alex did his show the next day, Tuesday the 22nd,
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:14:03.159
    | text      = which is what we're going to cover today.
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:14:05.120
    | text      = Marbles was able to convince Alex
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:14:06.860
    | text      = to go to see a doctor friend of his, Dr. Amy Offutt, who
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:14:10.159
    | text      = practices in Marble Falls, Texas, which is about an hour
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:14:13.799
    | text      = outside Austin.
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:14:14.539
    | text      = And at this point, I feel like we're
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:14:16.159
    | text      = in some kind of a weird Marbles-based synchronousy.
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:14:18.360
    | text      = Yeah, what is going on here?
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:14:19.519
    | text      = I don't know.
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:14:20.159
    | text      = We're Smurfs?
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:14:21.080
    | text      = What is going?
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:14:21.759
    | text      = I feel like I'm asleep or something,
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:14:23.679
    | text      = and I'm dreaming of Marbles.
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:14:24.879
    | text      = Oh, you're just marbling, not the Marbles the way
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:14:28.600
    | text      = that Marbles need to marble.
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:14:29.720
    | text      = Right, she prescribed marble rye.
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:14:33.240
    | text      = So Alex saw Dr. Offutt in the morning of Wednesday, March
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:14:36.799
    | text      = 23, and as such, he didn't do his show.
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:14:39.720
    | text      = Additionally, he didn't show up for the first day
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:14:41.840
    | text      = of his scheduled deposition, which
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:14:43.600
    | text      = was supposed to be, like I said, on Wednesday and Thursday.
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:14:46.360
    | text      = This could end up being a problem down the line
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:14:48.440
    | text      = and might result in some sanctions.
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:14:51.399
    | text      = Dr. Offutt was in agreement with Marbles.
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:14:54.039
    | text      = She said that Alex shouldn't be doing this deposition at all,
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:14:57.320
    | text      = based on issues related to stress.
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:15:00.120
    | text      = She said, quote, I had a medical visit
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:15:01.840
    | text      = with Mr. Alex Jones for acute medical issues
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:15:04.519
    | text      = that were time sensitive and potentially serious.
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:15:08.120
    | text      = This is a little tough to parse, because the time sensitivity
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:15:10.759
    | text      = could be in reference to him having a hard deadline
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:15:12.879
    | text      = about the deposition, as opposed to it being something
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:15:15.320
    | text      = where his health dictated the time sensitivity.
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:15:18.000
    | text      = It's unclear.
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:15:19.759
    | text      = In her note, however, there's a redaction.
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:15:22.639
    | text      = Quote, we started a comprehensive medical evaluation,
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:15:25.480
    | text      = and he has labs that are pending to assess his blank status.
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:15:29.960
    | text      = I've asked him to avoid too much stress
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:15:31.960
    | text      = until we have results from the blood tests this morning.
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:15:35.080
    | text      = Sure.
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:15:35.759
    | text      = Assuming that this isn't all an elaborate charade,
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:15:37.840
    | text      = that's kind of worrying.
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:15:38.960
    | text      = And if I had to guess, this has to do
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:15:41.039
    | text      = with the medical condition that's
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:15:42.759
    | text      = on full display every day.
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:15:45.080
    | text      = I guess it has something to do with him having a ridiculously
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:15:48.559
    | text      = high risk of heart attack or stroke.
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:15:50.480
    | text      = Probably.
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:15:51.120
    | text      = Both of these are things that can be exacerbated
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:15:53.360
    | text      = by increased stress, and markers would be the kind of things
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:15:55.919
    | text      = you'd find doing blood tests.
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:15:58.000
    | text      = On Wednesday, Alex didn't do his show,
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:16:00.120
    | text      = but he recorded a long voice memo while he was driving,
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:16:03.200
    | text      = probably to Dr. Offit's office in Marble Falls,
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:16:06.480
    | text      = that Owen played periodically on the show
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:16:08.360
    | text      = to keep the audience from tuning out from his boring ends.
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:16:10.519
    | text      = Right.
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:16:11.039
    | text      = Just in case they might think that Alex accidentally showed up
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:16:13.840
    | text      = again, so they, oh, maybe he'll come back.
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:16:16.000
    | text      = Yeah.
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:16:16.480
    | text      = We got him.
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:16:17.080
    | text      = Yeah.
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:16:17.559
    | text      = So a couple of fun pieces of trivia
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:16:19.200
    | text      = to throw in just for flavor here.
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:16:21.519
    | text      = Dr. Marbles included the dubious claim
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:16:24.159
    | text      = that he was nominated for a Nobel Peace Prize in 2021
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:16:27.080
    | text      = in his statement of facts in his affidavit, which is hilarious.
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:16:30.279
    | text      = I read that.
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:16:31.120
    | text      = I read that, and I still don't believe it's true.
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:16:33.759
    | text      = And yet it's in an affidavit.
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:16:35.440
    | text      = He swore it.
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:16:36.000
    | text      = That's wrong.
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:16:37.000
    | text      = Also, it's hard to get a sense of who Dr. Offit is,
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:16:39.879
    | text      = but I was able to find an August 2021
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:16:42.360
    | text      = article from a local Texas blog about how her and her husband
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:16:45.720
    | text      = had decided not to get vaccinated.
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:16:47.759
    | text      = Good doctor.
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:16:48.559
    | text      = She doesn't run a normal medical office either.
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:16:51.080
    | text      = Not a surprise.
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:16:51.799
    | text      = She works out of a place called Heart and Soul Integrative
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:16:54.799
    | text      = Health and Yoga.
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:16:56.000
    | text      = Oh, OK.
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:16:57.399
    | text      = She apparently has an MD, but her practice
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:17:00.159
    | text      = is in integrative medicine, which is definitely not
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:17:02.840
    | text      = where you'd go if you were in need of acute emergency
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:17:05.440
    | text      = consultation.
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:17:06.799
    | text      = Integrative medicine is built on relationships with patients,
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:17:09.960
    | text      = and her practice seems to actually be
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:17:11.640
    | text      = one that involves a bunch of hormone therapy and yoga.
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:17:15.000
    | text      = Also, she doesn't accept insurance, which is strange.
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:17:18.319
    | text      = Well, no insurance will accept her.
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:17:20.240
    | text      = I think she can say that, but I'm pretty sure
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:17:22.559
    | text      = it goes the other way around.
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:17:23.720
    | text      = I'm not sure.
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:17:24.599
    | text      = Certainly that's not how it's put on the website.
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:17:26.599
    | text      = Yeah, I would imagine so.
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:17:27.759
    | text      = I don't know what's going up here,
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:17:29.180
    | text      = but this is 100% not the doctor.
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:17:30.839
    | text      = You drive an hour to see if you're
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:17:32.319
    | text      = needing a consultation about a condition that
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:17:34.200
    | text      = could be an emergency.
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:17:35.759
    | text      = None of this adds up.
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:17:37.079
    | text      = None of it makes sense.
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:17:38.359
    | text      = And I think that she has some kind of association
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:17:40.480
    | text      = with the America Frontline doctors,

    | timestamp = 00:49:46.280
    | text      = and the Nazis had their own New World Order,

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker

    | name      = Unknown Speaker

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker

}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:50:07.679

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker

}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:50:13.599

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:50:14.760

}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:50:16.119

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker

    | name      = Unknown Speaker

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:50:24.880

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker

}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:50:31.440

}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker

    | text      = There are a couple of important things to point out here,
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker

}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker

}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker

{{TranscriptBlock

}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker

{{TranscriptBlock

}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:50:51.159

}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker

    | text      = And Dr. Marbles and I have got a peace problem.
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:50:54.920
    | text      = So the material involved in the Nuremberg Trials
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:50:57.159

}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:51:00.199
    | text      = would itself be the work of a person's entire career.
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:51:03.239
    | text      = If you want to cite something in it,
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:51:04.760

}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:51:06.320

}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker

}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker

{{TranscriptBlock

}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:51:17.239

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker

{{TranscriptBlock

}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
